mapper.select: select * from trades where trade_code = #{tradeCode} or trader_id = #{traderId} order by trade_reg_date
mapper.insert: insert into trades(trade_num, trader_id, trade_code, product_code, title, contents, trade_img_file_name, location, price) values(trade_num_seq.nextval, #{traderId}, #{tradeCode}, #{productCode}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{tradeImgFileName}, #{location}, #{price})
